variable.label: Decoder Address:
Adresa dekodéru:
variable.tooltip: Accessory decoder address. CV1 - LSB. CV9 - MSB.
Adresa dekodéru příslušenství. CV1 - LSB. CV9 - MSB.

variable.label: Key:
Klíč:
variable.tooltip: Key for lock. Universal key is 255.
Klíč k zámku. Univerzální klíč je 255.

variable.label: Lock:
Zámek:
variable.tooltip: Value other than 0 lock the decoder.

variable.label: Fade:
Rychlost stmívání/rozsvěcení:
variable.tooltip: Speed of dimming/lighting of signal lights.
Signal mast 0 Signal light upper yellow.
Signal mast 0 Signal light lower yellow.
Signal mast 0 Signal light green strip.
Signal mast 0 Signal light yellow strip.
Signal mast 0 Signal light lunar lower.
Signal mast 1 Signal light upper yellow.
Signal mast 1 Signal light lower yellow.
Signal mast 1 Signal light green strip.
Signal mast 1 Signal light yellow strip.
Signal mast 1 Signal light lunar lower.
Signal mast 2 Signal light upper yellow.
Signal mast 2 Signal light lower yellow.
Signal mast 2 Signal light green strip.
Signal mast 2 Signal light yellow strip.
Signal mast 2 Signal light lunar lower.
Signal mast 3 Signal light upper yellow.
Signal mast 3 Signal light lower yellow.
Signal mast 3 Signal light green strip.
Signal mast 3 Signal light yellow strip.
Signal mast 3 Signal light lunar lower.
Signal mast 4 Signal light upper yellow.
Signal mast 4 Signal light lower yellow.
Signal mast 4 Signal light green strip.
Signal mast 4 Signal light yellow strip.
Signal mast 4 Signal light lunar lower.
Signal mast 5 Signal light upper yellow.
Signal mast 5 Signal light lower yellow.
Signal mast 5 Signal light green strip.
Signal mast 5 Signal light yellow strip.
Signal mast 5 Signal light lunar lower.
Signal mast 6 Signal light upper yellow.
Signal mast 6 Signal light lower yellow.
Signal mast 6 Signal light green strip.
Signal mast 6 Signal light yellow strip.
Signal mast 6 Signal light lunar lower.
Signal mast 7 Signal light upper yellow.
Signal mast 7 Signal light lower yellow.
Signal mast 7 Signal light green strip.
Signal mast 7 Signal light yellow strip.
Signal mast 7 Signal light lunar lower.

label.text: Each output can only be assigned to one light.
Každý výstup může být přiřazen pouze jednomu světlu.
All signal mast do not have to be assigned.
